title: Miles Gray: 	Amateur Astronaut, Stallone’s Nightmare Future 2.25.20
itunes:title: Miles Gray: 	Amateur Astronaut, Stallone’s Nightmare Future 2.25.20
description:
In episode 576, Jack and Miles are joined by journalist and author Joel Stein to discuss the death of flat earth-er Mike Hughes, the Harvey Weinstein verdict, the Nevada caucuses, Sylvester Stallone's new film, PAW Patrol, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Mike Hughes: Man who wanted to prove Earth is flat dies after crashing homemade rocket
  2. Live Updates: Harvey Weinstein Is Found Guilty of Rape
  3. Nevada caucuses highlights: Sanders wins, Buttigieg campaign challenges some results
  4. Sylvester Stallone Sci Fi-Action Pic ‘Little America’ Pre-Sells To Raft Of Major Territories For AGC At EFM
  5. PAW Patrol
  6. Does Paw Patrol encourage our kids to embrace capitalism?
  7. Andrew Scheer Defends Free-Market Capitalism And 'Paw Patrol’
  8. WATCH: Denny Laflare - Twelve Hundred

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
